description: Detection thresholds and weights for ensemble DDoS detection

notes.entropy_threshold: Threshold for entropy-based detection (0.0-1.0, higher = more sensitive)
notes.cusum_threshold: Threshold for CUSUM change detection (statistical threshold)
notes.pca_threshold: Threshold for PCA anomaly detection (reconstruction error)
notes.use_weighted: If true, use weighted combination instead of ensemble (OR logic)
notes.weights: Weights for weighted combination (must sum to 1.0)
